p: The aerial parts of the plants were washed with water. After drying in the shade, the material was ground into a fine powder using a grinding apparatus. 10 g of the powder was extracted with 100 ml of hydroethanolic solution (7 : 3 v/v ethanol: distilled water) for 45 min. The mixture was filtered, then concentrated at low temperature, and finally preserved at −80°C until use.
